name: Harvey's Fitness Center
description: The Fitness Center at Harvey's Lake Tahoe provides hotel guests with a well-equipped workout space to maintain their fitness routine while on a golf trip. The facility includes cardio machines, free weights, strength training equipment, and stretch areas. At 6,200 feet elevation, even a light workout here provides extra conditioning.
shortDescription: Well-equipped hotel fitness center at 6,200 feet elevation at Harvey's Tahoe.

faqs.question: Is the fitness center free for hotel guests?
faqs.answer: Yes, the fitness center is complimentary for Harvey's hotel guests.

faqs.question: What equipment is available?
faqs.answer: Cardio machines, free weights, strength training equipment, and stretch areas.

faqs.question: Does the altitude affect workouts?
faqs.answer: At 6,200 feet, you may notice increased effort — stay hydrated and ease into your routine.

meta.title: Harvey's Fitness Center – Lake Tahoe Gym | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Stay fit at Harvey's Tahoe fitness center with cardio, weights, and strength training at 6,200 feet. Complimentary for guests.
